Actions: Each opponent discards 2 card, mills 2 card, and sacrifices 1 creature, enchantment and artifact.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:3]
Each opponent sacrifices ${currentRound+1} creatures.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:3]
For each opponent, sacrifice 2 nonland permanents of the player's choice.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:4]
The Raid Monster deals 12 damage to each player and 5 to each planeswalker.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:2]
The Raid Monster deals 18 damage to each player and 7 to each planeswalker.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:3]
The Raid Monster deals 12 damage to each player and 5 to each planeswalker.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:3]
The Raid Monster deals 18 damage to each player and 7 to each planeswalker.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:3]
The Raid Monster gains 12 life, removes 9 infect counters, and deals 3 damage to each planeswalker.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:3]
The Raid Monster gains 12 life, removes 9 infect counters, and deals 3 damage to each planeswalker.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:2]
The Raid Monster gains 7 life and deals to ${diceRolledThisRound+1} damage to each creature it doesn't control.[Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:2]
Until the beginning of the Monster’s next turn, players cannot draw more than 1 cards.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:4]
Until the beginning of the Monster’s next turn, players cannot play more than 1 spell each turn.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:1]
Each opponent sacrifices the tokens they control.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:1]
For each opponent, exile target permanent of the player's choice.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:5]
The Raid Monster creates 2 ${currentRound+1}/${currentRound+1} artifact creature in its colors, and it attacks the player with the highest life total this turn.[Creature][CMC:2]

The Raid Monster creates 4 ${diceRolledThisRound}/${diceRolledThisRound} flying, deathtouch, enchantment artifact creature tokens. All creatures attack each combat if able until the Raid Monsters next turn.[Creature][CMC:3]

The Raid Monster creates 4 ${diceRolledThisRound}/${diceRolledThisRound} flying, deathtouch, enchantment artifact creature tokens. All creatures attack each combat if able until the Raid Monsters next turn.[Creature][CMC:5]
Each opponent sacrifices all enchantments they control.[Artifact/Enchantment][CMC:4]
For each opponent, destroy target artifact of the player's choice.[Artifact/Enchantment][CMC:1]
Each opponent sacrifices half the number of artifacts they control rounded up.[Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:2]
For each opponent, exile target creature of the player's choice.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:1]
Each player exiles their graveyard and drains 12 life.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:1]
Each player exiles half their graveyard and drains 12 life.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:1]
Each player exiles 1 target permanent they control randomly and discards 1 card from their hand randomly.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:1]

For each opponent, target and destroy 3 nonland permanents with the highest CMC or lose life equal to the CMC of those permanents. Effects that prevent or redirect damage may not be used to counter this loss of life.[Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:2]
For each opponent counter the first 2 spells cast on their next turn.[Instant][CMC:4]
For each opponent, target and destroy the highest CMC permanent, its controller creates a 1/1 artifact creature.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment/Creature][CMC:2]
Each opponent shuffles ${diceRolledThisRound+1} nonland permanents of their choice into their decks.[Instant/Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:1]
Each opponent exiles one target non-token creature of their choice.[Instant/Sorcery][CMC:2]
Deal ${currentRound} damage to each creature and planeswalker.[Sorcery][CMC:6]
Destroy all nonland permanents with a CMC of ${diceRolledThisRound} or less.[Sorcery][CMC:3]
Each player destroys all non-basic lands they control.[Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:4]

Each player sacrifices ${diceRolledThisRound+1} permanents and creates a X/X changeling creature token in the monster's colors, where X is equal to the number of permanents sacraficed this way.[Instant][CMC:2]
The Raid Monster copies each player's highest CMC creature; it must attack the respective player this turn.[Creature][CMC:6]
Players do not get an untap phase until the Raid Monster's next turn.[Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:4]
Each player sacrafices a land, then the Raid Monster takes one more action.[Sorcery][CMC:6]
Until the Raid Monster's next turn, whenever a player draws a card, they must discard a card.[Sorcery/Enchantment][CMC:4]
